sentences.en: Adverse Drug Reactions ADR monitoring is an important part of hospital pharmacy.
sentences.cn: 药品不良反应监测是医院药学的重要组成部分.

sentences.en: All international vaccines must be ordered in advance at our pharmacy.
sentences.cn: 所有的国际疫苗必须通过我们的药房提前预订.

sentences.en: Antibiotic vial filling and sealing machine screw filling machine. --- Pharmacy Use.
sentences.cn: 抗生素针剂充填机,铝盖冯瓶机. ( 药厂 用)

sentences.en: As a rule, the pharmacy's proficiency and authority is little doubted.
sentences.cn: 通常, 药房的职业水平和权威是很少受到怀疑的.

sentences.en: As we headed for the pharmacy, I told her that Helen was going to help us.
sentences.cn: 我们往药房走时, 我告诉她海伦要来帮助我们.

sentences.en: He just was engaged in the pharmacy 16 years old.
Make sure you understand exactly how to take your medicines before you leave the pharmacy.
sentences.cn: 在离开药房之前，一定要弄明白自己的药该怎么吃。

sentences.en: Modern pharmacy has solved the problem of sleeplessness.
sentences.cn: 现代制药学已经解决了失眠问题.

sentences.en: Pharmacy students must be skilled in mathematics and the sciences.
sentences.cn: 药剂学校的学生必须要熟练掌握数学以及自然科学.

sentences.en: Please handle this form to the pharmacy to receive your medicine.
sentences.cn: 拿这张票据去药房领药.

sentences.en: The invention possesses a good application prospect in the pharmacy field.
sentences.cn: 该方法在制药领域有较好应用前景.

sentences.en: The moment to repeat Pharmacy had come.
sentences.cn: 重温Pharmacy旧日美梦的时刻已然来临.

sentences.en: You can have it filled at a pharmacy.
You can have it filled at pharmacy.
sentences.cn: 你可以到药方去配药了.

words.tran_cn: 药典，处方书；一批备用药品

trans.tran_cn: 药房，配药学，药学，制药业，一批备用药品
trans.tran_en: a shop or a part of a shop where medicines are prepared and sold
